article_title: Free Throws Costing the Knicks Plenty
article_text:
The Knicks have been doing lots of things right lately—they rode into Monday on a four-game win streak, after all—but if they want to maintain the momentum they've been building in 2014, they will have to get to the free-throw line more often.

Entering Monday's game against Phoenix, the Knicks were dead last in free-throw-attempt rate this season, getting to the charity stripe just 22.2 times for every 100 shots they take. For some perspective, consider that the Houston Rockets, who lead the NBA in this category, attempt...

twitter.description: The Knicks could be even better recently if they just got to the free-throw line.
twitter.title: Free Throws Costing the Knicks Plenty
